Michael Thomas Roarke (November 8, 1930 – July 27, 2019) was an American catcher and coach in Major League Baseball. He threw and batted right-handed. He stood tall and weighed. Roarke played for the Detroit Tigers, St. Louis Cardinals and the San Diego Padres.
Roarke died on July 27, 2019 in West Warwick, Rhode Island at the age of 88.
